content: Keep your work space looking immaculate by constantly sucking up any dirt or crumbs with this USB powered vacuum cleaner. It plugs directly into your PC’s USB port and features two different power settings for heavier dirt and dust.

Work on your backside tan without having to strain your neck by laying out on this face down beach lounger. The ergonomically designed cushion cradles your face so you can comfortably lie face-down and be able to read a good book.

Take your NERF wars to new heights by arming you and your comrades with these lethal NERF thunder bows. It’s designed to handle like a real bow and can fire up to five darts all at once – no reloading required – that will scream through the air.

Answer nature’s call even if there isn’t a bathroom in sight by mounting the truck hitch toilet seat onto your trusty ride. This off-road commode easily installs onto your ride to provide a rudimentary yet surprisingly comfortable place to take care of business.

Have fun at the expense of the elderly as you go head to head with a buddy racing these wind up granny racers. They require no batteries and come in the shape of an elderly woman limping along on her walker while grandpa follows on his flashy scooter.

Ensure your electronic devices stay juiced up while you perform your daily commute by charging them using this bicycle powered USB charger. The 1000 mAh battery runs quietly and virtually drag-free to keep any USB rechargeable device powered up.

Make day-to-day activities a little easier on yourself by transporting whatever you need in these collapsible storage containers. These sturdy crates pop open in a snap and can be flattened out just as easily to save on storage space.

Transform your plain phone into a state of the art 3D headset with this smartphone virtual reality headset. Compatible with both Apple and Android models, it lets you fully immerse yourself in what you are watching without causing a dizzying effect.

Keep your feet warm and cozy while you bring your favorite pill like characters to life using these Minion plush slippers. Each slipper is designed to look like an adorable little Minion that’s eager to keep your footsies nice and toasty.

Keep the tunes blasting throughout your entire ride by playing them out of the water bottle shaped speaker. The rugged waterproof design comes with Bluetooth connectivity that allows this compact speaker to output your favorite tunes from within the water bottle rack.

Make the party come alive by creating seizure inducing lighting effects on the dance floor with this rotating LED strobe lamp. It features an energy saving LED light with a 20,000 hour lifespan so it’s guaranteed to keep the party going all night long.

Turn any lake or water stream you come across into a viable source for hydrating using this water purifying system. It features an easy to use lever pump that filters water from the lake through the machine to eliminate up to 99.999% of waterborne bacteria.

Ditch the smartphone and kick it old school by capturing special moments using this vintage Polaroid camera. This Polaroid OneStep camera features a rigid and durable plastic body and utilizes SX-70 integral film so you can instantly print out photos.

Take your outdoor excursions to new heights by bringing along the rollable portable bong. As indispensable as your trusty hunting knife, it features an all silicone body that can be rolled up into a ball, yet is capable of delivering clean and powerful hits.

Ensure valuable data remains intact in the event of a catastrophe by storing it inside this waterproof and fireproof hard drive. It features a speedy USB 3.0 interface, runs silently, and is practically indestructible – making this an ideal place to store your data.

Stop counting years and focus on the celebration instead when you top off your cake with these “Happy Fucking Birthday” candles. The candles come in an assortment of vibrant colors and work great for those who like to keep their age a secret.

If numbers aren’t your thing, the image padlock will provide a fun and easier way to help you remember your combination. Rather than opening the lock with digits, you must go through a series of images like a star, heart, or umbrella.

Brighten up your kitchen counter with color and style by using this pocketknife shaped organizer to store all your utensils. The functional design features four compartmentalized storage sections, providing a smart streamlined way of storing them.

Enjoy a relaxing day on the water atop this giant swan pool float. Measuring over seventy five inches long, the swan includes a pair of grippy handles on the neck for added support, so it’ll be practically impossible to fall over unless you’re violently inebriated.

Add a little urban flair to your suburban abode without having to inhale any toxic fumes by decorating with this graffiti wall mural. The mural is printed onto high quality poster paper and cut into eight pieces that you can easily paste onto the wall.

Cook the perfect breakfast in no time at all by preparing your eggs using this microwave egg cooker. Unlike traditional stovetop methods, this cooker allows you to easily make delicious and fluffy scrambled eggs in just a minute.

Keep your campsite lit during any type of weather conditions by lighting the area with this rugged waterproof outdoor lantern. It produces 220 lumens of light output even in the most adverse of weather and can survive falls up to 5 feet.

Experience good vibrations on a daily basis by wearing this mood altering headpiece. It uses neurosignaling waveforms to deliver calm or energetic vibes on demand, helping you de-stress or invigorate yourself for peak performance.

Avoid  constantly looking for your lighter every time you want to light up by keeping it handy at all times with this USB lighter watch. When you want to spark up, the sleek face slides off to the side to reveal a small useful lighter.

Have a laugh looking through failed works inside the pages of this Crap Taxidermy book. This nightmare inducing work of art showcases some of the most spectacularly atrocious attempts at taxidermy ever attempted by man.

Put your motor skills to the ultimate test next time you go drinking by playing this drunken tower drinking game. Each block comes printed with a short command instructing you and nearby players on how much alcohol to consume while you remove the blocks.

Solve any dilemma that comes your way with ruthless efficiency with hep from this pros and cons notepad. Whenever you’re struggling with one of life’s many conundrums, simply list the good and the bad on each side so you can rationally reach a decision.

Light up your performance with more than just your amazing percussions when you play with these color changing LED drumsticks. These high tech drumsticks are fitted with a small LED that makes the entire stick glow in one of seven eye catching colors.

Keep your eyes on the road by equipping your ride with this steering wheel smartphone mount. It hooks directly onto your steering wheel so that you can maintain hands free navigation while your GPS provides you with step by step directions.

Give your morning routine a little extra kick by lathering up with this caffeinated shaving cream. Made from all natural ingredients, it’s fortified with rich antioxidants to help reduce the appearance of redness and keep you feeling fresh and energized.

Help get a blissful night’s sleep every time you lay down by placing this sleep enhancing light next to your bed. Originally designed to help astronauts manage their sleep cycles, it combines different types of LEDs to influence the level of melatonin in your body.

Ensure your next venture into the deep goes off swimmingly by keeping track of vital information using this steel dive computer. It monitors things like depth and dive time and displays them on a backlit LED screen with a colorful 320 x 240 resolution.

Serve the perfect scoop every time no matter how frozen your ice cream is by using this heated thermo-ring scoop. Biodegradable liquid transfers heat from the handle to the edges so you can easily carve into the carton without having to strain your dainty wrist.

Quit carrying keys around like a neanderthal and step into the twenty first century by upgrading your home with a biometric fingerprint lock. Simple to install and program, the lock features an infrared sensor that uses your fingerprint to open and close the lock.

A hot meal is never far away when you head into the great outdoors equipped with this ultra portable camping stove. Made of stainless steel and aluminum alloy, it’s designed to stand up to high temperatures and latches on to any propane canister in seconds.

Keep a feline friend close by at all times when you prop the door in your home using this cat paw doorstop. It’s made from a tough rubber material designed to stand up to heavy use while providing a laugh or two for everyone that comes across it.

See what lurks underneath the water’s surface when you go swimming with the snorkeling window pool float. The ingenious design allows you to gaze beneath the water without having to deal with the discomfort caused by masks and snorkels.

Guarantee your team comes out victorious by arming yourself with this 70 MPH NERF gun. Viewed as the crown jewel of the NERF arsenal, it holds 12 NERFS balls per magazine, has flip up sights for added accuracy, and has a trigger lock for additional safety.

Head out into this dangerous world with a little piece of mind knowing you’ve got the titanium survival whistle on you. The sleek and sturdy design allow the whistle to function in nearly any environment so you can effortlessly produce a pitch at 120 decibels.

Avoid accidents while sharing the road by making your intentions clear to everyone using these bike handlebar turn signal lights. Shockproof and waterproof, they mount easily onto straight or curved handlebars so they can easily be spotted from behind.

Enjoy an ice cold brew any time of the day no matter where you are by keeping the 24 hour chilling beer growler by your side. This 64 oz grown-up thermos is double walled and vacuum insulated so your beer stays frosty and fresh hours after you poured it.

You’ll always have a friend to talk to while you sip your tea when you prepare it using this rubber duckie tea infuser. After loading it with coarse tea leaves, the duckie joyfully floats about as the tea dissolves into the piping hot cup of water.

Become a master yogi in a fraction of the time by mastering your positions with this instructional yoga mat. It features hand and foot placements printed onto the surface of the mat that show you where to place your limbs for a variety of different poses.

Keep track of your many adventures in a fun and creative way by marking them down on this scratch off travel poster. Every time you visit a new country, you can go over it using an eraser to uncover the alluring green shade underneath.

Make outdoor events more enjoyable for yourself and those around you by spraying some insect repellent perfume before heading out. The all natural ingredients of this unisex fragrance come from the Southeast Asian jungle and carry a delightful scent.

Dine like a gentleman even when in the middle of nowhere by bringing this titanium 3-in-1 camping utensil along for the ride. The ergonomic design fits a spoon, fork, and knife into a compact package with a polished surface that produces no metallic aftertaste.

This is the droid you’re looking for! Controllable by any smartphone device, this fully functional miniature BB-8 droid features an internal self-righting mechanism to provide gyroscopic propulsion identical to the real BB-8 droid seen in Star Wars: The Force Awakens.

Keep opened bottles of wine at the ideal drinking conditions for up to 10 days with the wine preservation machine. Apart from chilling wine to the ideal temperature based on 15 preset varietals, it employs vacuum technology to resist the effects of oxidation.

Make any part of your room or office radiate with color by decorating it using these bismuth crystals. These gorgeous man-made crystals display iridescent rainbows caused by light scattering off the thin layers of bismuth oxide when its hot surface reacts to air.

Bring the house down at your next performance when you hit the stage using the ultimate karaoke system. Apart from a Hi-fidelity 2.1 home theater system, it includes features like natural pitch-correction along with a realistic backup singers setting.

Keep your raging alcoholism under wraps by disguising your booze in this stealth beer koozie. This clever lid fits over any beer can which can then be placed in a standard coffee cup, creating an insulated and discreet koozie to drink your beer from.

Defrost rock solid slabs of meat in mere minutes by setting them on top of the ultra fast defrosting tray. The thermal conductive material of the tray dramatically speeds up the thawing process so your meat and poultry are ready to cook when you need them.

Keep your body feeling great throughout the workweek by relieving stress inside the dual whirlpool bathtub. This luxury tub is designed with 4 fully adjustable TheraPro jets in addition to 19 AccuPro jets that can combine for several different jet settings.

Maximize your home’s limited storage space with help from this cable lifted storage rack. It boasts a sturdy steel structure which can hold up to 250 pounds and utilizes a handy pulley system so you can easily raise and lower the platform.

Take a decorating cue from Bruce Wayne by styling your home with this sleek Batman logo mirror. This geeky mirror measures 28 inches across and can be conveniently mounted onto most walls – making this a must-have for any <del>batcave</del> man cave.

The pop-up socket and USB charger combines style and functionality to bring you a convenient way to keep a charging station nearby without sacrificing counter space – as this vertical structure conveniently hides underneath the surface when not in use.

Enjoy a healthy snack without sacrificing flavor by seasoning your meals with powered peanut butter. Made from all natural ingredients including roasted peanuts, sugar, and salt, this gluten-free treat provides a great taste and an even greater source of protein.

Learn everything the modern gentleman should know by studying the contents within “The Art of Manliness” book. The book places a wealth of information at your fingertips ranging from courting the lady of your choice to basic survival skills.

Take your work to new heights by upgrading your workstation with this HD graphic monitor from Wacom. This 24″ interactive drawing tablet features a 1920 x 1200 native resolution and can be adjusted to float over your knees for the perfect working position.

Experience what it’s like to go sledding in the summer when you hit the lake on the towable water raft. Made from highly buoyant closed cell foam, the raft extends 22 feet out and can accommodate up to 6 people while being towed at 20 mph.

titleEN: Star Wars Paper Craft Action Figures
content: Spruce up your room or office with some geeky flair using these Star Wars paper craft action figures. Each one of these tiny figurines comes fully assembled in a cool little display case ideal for showcasing them to all your geeky buddies.

Wash away the stress caused by a hectic day by making bath time a little more enjoyable with the bath tub wine glass holder. The suction cup sticks securely onto porcelain or tile and can accommodate both stemware and cans.

Ensure sensitive information never leaks out by delivering a message using the invisible ink spy pen. The pen comes filled with ink made from compounds that appear invisible to the naked eye, but magically appear while under ultraviolet light.

Keep a toolbox’s worth of gadgets handy at all times by adding the titanium multi-tool key to your everyday carry. Crafted from grade 5 titanium, it’s incredibly strong yet lightweight and is fitted with over 18 tools ranging from a pill splitter to a canister lid popper.

Keep your refreshments icy cold all day long without them ever becoming diluted by pouring them inside this double chamber drink cooler. The ingenious design comes with a built in two gallon ice container at the center.

Bring any room in your home to life by giving it a dash of color using this light matrix cube. This compact cube measures 4 inches all around, making it ideal for any desktop and comes fitted with 64 full color LEDs that create endless variations.

Defy the laws of physics next time you feel like listening to your favorite tunes by blasting them out of this orb floating speaker. This eye catching Bluetooth speaker delivers crisp high fidelity sound as it levitates above its sleek metallic base.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Air Jordans
content: Get noticed when you walk into the club by keeping your sneaker game on point with the glow in the dark Air Jordan 5 Doernbecher. These one of a kind kicks look great during daytime and even better when the lights are turned off.

Avoid getting a DUI during a night out on the town by monitoring your buzz with the keychain breathalyzer. It’s small enough to fit comfortably in your pocket and provides accurate readings of your body’s blood alcohol level.

Save important documents just like they did in the olden days using this steampunk USB drive. Apart from its eye-catching retro sci-fi design, the thumb drive is USB 3.0 interface compatible and works with all major platforms including Linux.

Experience the awesome power of mother nature from the comfort of home when you gaze at this fun pet tornado. A few twists of the wrist is all you need to create tiny twisters from the white foam clouds floating inside.

Cramming for the big test has never been easier thanks to this three way tip highlighter. Available in a variety of vibrant colors, it comes with a uniquely shaped tip that lets you create lines of varying thickness so you can highlight, underline, and circle.

Whether you need protection or hydration, this bottle opener self defense knife has got you covered. It features a sturdy carbon steel construction, comes with a 3/4″ fixed blade and features a handy bottle opener at the base.

Elevate the quality of your home movies by recording them using this 3-axis cell phone stabilizer. It installs in a snap and allows you to capture amazingly smooth footage while panning from left to right without having a dizzying or shaky effect.

Turn any surface of your home or office into a giant touchscreen using this ingenious projection kit. It requires no complicated setup and allows you to use your finger or a Ubi pen to interact with any Windows-based application.

Avoid blowouts by keeping your bicycle or car’s tires at optimal conditions using this tire pressure monitoring system. This Bluetooth connected system is designed for all types of tires and pairs with your smartphone so you can conveniently access inflation levels.

Turn the workplace into your home away from home by outfitting your cubicle with the reclining office chair. This luxury padded leather chair reclines all the way back and comes with a convenient foot rest that extends outwards for maximum comfort while you rest.

Ensure you’re ready to handle whatever life throws your way by adding the “How To Survive Anything” book to your literary collection. This highly informative and entertaining read provides a visual guide on how to handle everything from small talk to a shipwreck.

Find your inner peace by escaping the modern world around you while perusing through this Cabin Porn book. Each page transports you to an idyllic country setting where you’ll find some of the most remarkable rural homes in the whole world.

Create a beautiful memento that’ll last forever in mere minutes by giving a loved their very own message in a bottle. This kit comes with everything you’ll need to construct and deliver an unforgettable message to the person of your choosing.

Hang your keys in true rockstar fashion by outfitting your home with one of these amp shaped key hangers. Each hanger is molded from 1/8 inch thick plastic in the shape of a guitar amplifier and lets you conveniently hang your keys in the jack port.

If you’d do anything to lose weight and get those washboard abs – except diet and exercise – have we got a product for you. The six packs abs training gear is the revolutionary new way to engage and stimulate your abdominal muscles without having to lift a finger.

Keep your valuables safe from prying eyes while out in public by placing them inside this secret stash Pepsi bottle. While the inside is hollowed out, the exterior is made to look identical to a real Pepsi bottle right down to the weight and sloshing dark liquid.

Change the appearance of your entire home on the fly using these color turntable LED smartbulbs. Using your smartphone, you’ll be able to program a variety of lighting effects, such as syncing the lightbulbs to music and creating breathtaking sunrises.

Perform everyday tasks just like the Caped Crusader would using this Batman symbol multi-tool keychain. This handy little black anodized finish tool comes fitted with two different tipped screwdrivers in addition to a bottle opener at the center.

Get over your irrational fear of anthropods by getting up close and personal with one of these realistic isopod plushies. One look at this adorably soft aquatic cockroach-like creature’s underside and you’ll never look at isopods the same way ever again.

Instantly turn any patch of dirt into the ideal rest area using this pocket sized picnic blanket. This ultra compact blanket is designed to be puncture resistant and also features weighted corners so it won’t fly away on windy days.

It’s a dog eat dog world – so dress accordingly by wearing this realistic pug mask. This hilarious looking mask comes covered in faux fur and features an independent mouth piece that moves when you talk so you can live the pug life.

Prepare delectable gourmet meals in mere minutes using this microwave pasta cooker. Made from 100% platinum silicone, it’s designed to never overflow and will save you a ton of time by allowing you to cook without ever having to boil water.

Give your trusty automobile a fierce look that other drivers will both fear and envy by outfitting your car with the halo headlight kit. The kit comes with 2 high beam and 2 low beam plasma halo lights that glow ultra bright in one of five eye-catching hues.

Kick boredom to the curb by channeling your old school gamer roots playing on the world’s smallest arcade gaming system. This open platform JAVA game console can play thousands of J2ME games while fitting comfortably in the palm of your hands.

Make your loved one’s special day a little more memorable by driving them insane with this never ending singing birthday card. From the moment the card is opened it plays music nonstop until the battery dies hours later.

Give your garden a magical nighttime glow without raising the electric bill by illuminating your yard using these solar fairy string lights. They’re waterproof, glow in a bevy of vibrant colors and can stay lit for up to eight full hours when fully charged.

Get your little pooch ready for adventure south of the border by dressing him up in one of these Mexican dog ponchos. Each poncho is made from authentic Mexican blankets and fitted with Velcro neck and chest straps for easy removal.

Keep your room looking clean without having to make constant trips to the trash can by getting your hands on the remote control garbage can. With the easy to use controller, you’ll be able to direct this battery powered appliance directly to where the mess is.

Luck is for chumps. Ensure you’re ready when disaster strikes by studying this Navy SEAL survival book. Written by former SEAL and survival expert Cade Courtley, the book shows you step-by-step instructions on how to handle virtually anything.

Make those world famous brownies of yours a little extra special by baking them in these cannabis leaf cake pans. Made from oven-safe silicone, each mold in the set lets you bake up to four small pot leaf shaped pastries perfect for satisfying the munchies.

Create an inviting environment for all winged creatures by adding this garden gnome bird feeder to your yard. This helpful little guy proudly stands holding out a small blue seed bowl so the birds have something to eat out of when they drop by to crap on your lawn.

Help pass the time between TV seasons by playing on this Game Of Thrones edition Monopoly game board. All aspects of the game including tokens, cards and even play money have been customized for fans of the iconic franchise.

Give your cocktail an Asian twist by cooling it off using a Mount Fuji shaped ice cube. Using this custom mold, you’ll be able to make colossal ice cubes shaped like the famous Japanese natural landmark in as little as eight minutes.
